name: Vegetable-Pasta Toss
author: Pat Schlosser

ingredients.name: large red onion, thinly sliced into rings
lb. bacon, crisp fried and crumbled
(8 oz.) can sliced water chestnuts, drained

instructions: Cook vermicelli using package directions. drain. Combine broccoli, cauliflower and onion in large bowl. Mix Parmesan cheese, sugar, salt, basil and mayonnaise in small bowl. Add to vegetables, toss lightly. Chill for several hours to overnight. Add bacon, vermicelli, croutons and water chestnuts just before serving, toss lightly.
